summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twentieth Avenue Northwest, from Ballard Avenue to Shilshole Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing wood walks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 1456 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
